description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5} mod 7; a(n)=floor(7(n-1)/6).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Crossrefs and explicit formula in name added by _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 05 2014
